title: Spacious 3 bedroom + office, 2.5 bath home by UChicago
posting_body: Spacious 3 bedroom + office, 2.5 bath home by UChicago!
House is walking distance to the 61st St. Farmer's Market, UChicago campus, and has a UChicago shuttle stop steps from the front door.
Within 10 blocks of Target, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's and the restaurants, coffee shops, and shopping corridors of Hyde Park.
Get the best of all worlds, with an idyllic neighborhood, walkable convenience, and easy connections to the Loop (3 minutes from the Metra stop) just a stone's throw away.
The house will be your oasis with 3 bright & large bedrooms on the top floor, an extra office + family room downstairs, and a huge back deck which comes with outdoor furniture and a grill.
Parking is available in the private 2-car garage, plus ample parking on the street.
Full size, new stainless steel appliances in kitchen.
Smart house, equipped with Nest thermostat, front doorbell, and outdoor camera + automated blinds - controllable by Google Home.
Tenant pays all utilities, except lawn maintenance.
House will be available late August (exact date negotiable).
Reply with your preferred email and number to set up a viewing.
